title: Builders risk insurance policies
dataVerified: Project owner, contractor, project address, coverage amount, construction details
dataVisibleAfterVerification: Shows the issuer domain and the responder text (e.g., "Valid ID" or "Denied").
rationale: Prevents fake builders risk insurance. Domain binding verifies insurer. Lender requirement for construction loans. High project values ($500K-$100M+). Course of construction verification.
